name: @brightspace-ui/intl
description: Internationalization APIs for number, date, time and file size formatting and parsing in D2L Brightspace.

scripts.test:unit: concurrently -p name -n serve,test -s first -k "http-server -p 8080 . -s" "mocha-headless-chrome -f http://localhost:8080/test/index.html -a no-sandbox -a disable-setuid-sandbox"
scripts.test: npm run lint -s && npm run test:unit -s

author: D2L Corporation
